import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useAdmin } from '../../contexts/AdminContext'; import AnnouncementManager from '../../components/admin/AnnouncementManager'; import GalleryManager from '../../components/admin/GalleryManager'; import { LogOut, Bell, Calendar, Image, Phone, Clock, Users, BarChart3, Settings, Plus, Edit, Trash2, Eye, EyeOff } from 'lucide-react'; import './AdminDashboard.css'; type AdminSection = 'overview' | 'announcements' | 'events' | 'gallery' | 'contact' | 'schedule'; const AdminDashboard: React.FC = () => { const { logout, announcements, events, galleryImages, getActiveAnnouncement, getPublishedEvents, getPublishedImages } = useAdmin(); const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('overview'); const handleLogout = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to logout?')) { logout(); } }; const stats = { totalAnnouncements: announcements.length, activeAnnouncements: announcements.filter(a => a.isActive).length, totalEvents: events.length, publishedEvents: getPublishedEvents().length, totalImages: galleryImages.length, publishedImages: getPublishedImages().length }; return (
{/* Sidebar */}
‚úù

Admin Panel

St. Patrick's

{/* Main Content */}

{getSectionTitle(activeSection)}

Welcome, Admin
{activeSection === 'overview' && } {activeSection === 'announcements' && } {activeSection === 'events' && } {activeSection === 'gallery' && } {activeSection === 'contact' && } {activeSection === 'schedule' && }
); }; const getSectionTitle = (section: AdminSection): string => { const titles = { overview: 'Dashboard Overview', announcements: 'Manage Announcements', events: 'Manage Events', gallery: 'Manage Gallery', contact: 'Contact Information', schedule: 'Mass Schedule' }; return titles[section]; }; // Overview Section Component const OverviewSection: React.FC<{ stats: any }> = ({ stats }) => { const { getActiveAnnouncement } = useAdmin(); const activeAnnouncement = getActiveAnnouncement(); return (

{stats.publishedEvents} / {stats.totalEvents} total

Gallery Images

Parish Members

850+ active
{activeAnnouncement && (

Current Active Announcement

{activeAnnouncement.title} {activeAnnouncement.type}

{activeAnnouncement.message}

)}

Quick Actions

); }; // Placeholder components for other sections const AnnouncementsSection: React.FC = () => (

Announcements Management

Create, edit, and manage parish announcements

); const EventsSection: React.FC = () => (

Events Management

Manage parish events and community calendar

); const GallerySection: React.FC = () => (

Gallery Management

Upload and organize parish photos

); const ContactSection: React.FC = () => (

Contact Information

Update parish contact details and staff information

); const ScheduleSection: React.FC = () => (

Mass Schedule

Update Mass times and special services

); export default AdminDashboard;
